name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 20, Russia's air strikes on Ukraine affected the Chinese Consulate General in Odessa.
In response to reporters' questions, the spokesperson of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs said that the situation was true, but did not answer the question of whether negotiations had been made.
Earlier, Ukrainian President Zelensky released a video saying that Russia also destroyed 60,000 tons of commercial grain that was originally destined for China at the port during the air strikes.

content:
Today, many netizens submitted articles to me.
China News Weekly reported on Shijiazhuang's construction of China's rock city, saying that the Hebei Communist Youth League adapted "Kill That Shijiazhuang Man" into "The Unkillable Shijiazhuang Man".
This is actually an old news, and the song was adapted from the end of December 2021.
Finally, [click carefully].

July 21, Congjiang County, Guizhou
A private car was locked on the spot by the Congjiang County Urban Management Bureau because of mud on its tires. It must go to the office to receive processing and punishment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submissions
Recently, a netizen revealed that China Construction Eighth Engineering Bureau had cut corners in the construction of Shandong Lairong High-speed Railway, which posed a major safety hazard.
90% of the threaded installations on some sections of the Lairong High-speed Railway did not meet the relevant requirements and were 1.5 to 5.5 meters shorter than the designed length.
The person in charge of Sanjie Company repeatedly reported the problem to the project leader of China Construction Eighth Engineering Bureau, but the answer he received was "If you can do it, do it. If you can't do it, get out."
